name: home
story: You wake up and find yourself in home like a normal day
nav: Press 1 to gome to bathroom , Press 2 to go to bedroom and Press 3 to go to kitchen

name: bathroom
story: You are in Bathroom and you are bathing
nav: Press 1 you go to home , Press 2 to go to bedroom and Press 3 to go to readingroom

name: bedroom
story: You are sleeping in your bedroom
nav: Press 1 to go to reading room, Press 2 to go to porch, and press 3 to go to the suite

name: porch
story: Contemplate the snow falling from your porch view. You can lay back because you won the game!

name: suite
story: You rather have your own bathroom than share with other people
nav: Press 1 to go to the garden, Press 2 to go to the closet, and Press 3 to go to the staircase

name: attic
story: You are in the attic looking for an old chair
nav: Press 1 to go to the living room, Press 2 to go to the dining room, and Press 3 to go to the swimming pool

name: kitchen
story: You are in the kitchen preparing dinner
nav: Press 1 to go to the porch, Press 2 to go to the storage, and Press 3 to go to the staircase

name: readingroom
story: You are in the reading room
nav: Press 1 to go to the garage, Press 2 to go to the garden, and Press 3 to go to the closet

name: basement
story: You are in the basement. Its dark in here. Find the light switch
nav: Press 1 to go to laundry room, 2 to suite and 3 to attic

name: staircase
story: You are in the Staircase. You fall down and break your neck. Game over!

name: garage
story: You are in the garage parking your car
nav: Press 1 to go to the family room, Press 2 to go to the rooftop, and Press 3 to go to the bedroom

name: garden
story: Look at the beautiful flowers you grown here
nav: Press 1 to go to the attic, Press 2 to go to the swimming pool, and Press 3 to go home

name: laundryroom
story: You are in laundry room and you are removing your clean cloths
nav: Press 1 to go to kitchen, Press 2 to go to basement, and press 3 to go to the suite

name: livingroom
story: All the family is reunited in the living room, it is a holiday and it is celebration time

name: storage
story: There is a secret scroll hidden somewhere in this room, it will lead you to a treasure box.
nav: Press 1 to go to the bathroom, Press 2 to go to the Kitchen, and Press 3 to go to the garden.

name: diningroom
story: There is a secret scroll hidden somewhere in this room, it will lead you to a treasure box.
nav: Press 1 to go to staircase, 2 to kitchen, 3 to go bathroom

name: Closet
story: You are in the closet. Suite up! LOL (some HIMYM humor)
nav: Press 1 to go to Rooftop, Press 2 to go to kitchen, and press 3 to go to the garage

name: swiming pool
story: You are at the pool.
nav: Press 1 to go to basement, Press 2 to go to staircase, and press 3 to go to the garage

name: familyroom
story: You are at the pool.
nav: Press 1 to go to the storage, Press 2 to go to the garage, and Press 3 to go to the garden
